website_summaries.verdict: Price, brand reputation, and  features make this drill the Best of the Best. The kit is an exceptional value.
pros: Driver packs exceptional power and is extremely durable
Kit comes with numerous handy features designed to make your job easier
cons: Switch is touchy and slips into safety mode at the slightest touch

customer_reviews.title: What a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding tool. I'd recently had the opportunity to use an impact driver rather than a drill to install screws after drilling countersunk pilot holes. The quick connect 'drill and drive' type tool was ideally suited to use in an impact driver. The DCF887 is one sweet tool. The three speeds are wonderful for a wide spectrum of installations. I typically leave the setting at 1 and the torque is low enough that it's unlikely that I'll break another screw. The lower speed is ideal for starting screws. Absolutely NO regrets about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F. Kerby

customer_reviews.title: It has torque to spare.
customer_reviews.text: Torque torque torque should be the name of this dewalt. Even on the lowest setting It had to much torque to drive a 4" screw without stripping the head. I am by no means an expert, but I used a less powerful masterforce impact that didn't over torque and drove the 4" all the way in with a counter sink. It was slower, but got the job done. I would use this for heavier projects like driving lag bolts would be its ideal scenario. Good took, well built, just to much torque for smaller projects.
customer_reviews.author: nv

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I have used the driver for almost 6 months now as a contractor. It's a powerful small driver but I wish it came with bigger batteries. I had to buy bigger batteries later which leaves the small 2.0-ah batteries useless. I agree with other reviews about the batteries not sitting tight in the slot and at the low power mode is too weak. Other than those, it is still a very functional driver, powerful, light weight,...
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Tuik

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars - when you go to Lowe’s and Home ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars - when you go to Lowe’s and Home Depot and see those electric drill/ screwdriver sets from Ryobi or Black and Dekker etc. forget it and just buy one of these. This is the future of drilling/ screwdrivers here now. The size, the torque, the battery life and cost all make it a must buy. Don’t even bother with the other ones that have huge batteries, short battery life and almost no torque. You’re not getting a deal even if it’s your first tool or you’re just starting out or whatever. Just get this and move on to real decisions. This one is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out the "speeds" settings, this thing will drive a construction screw through whatever you're sending it into. At first I was trying to set it to a low speed, like I would my drill driver, to drive these big construction screws I was using for a flooring replacement project. The thing gave up 3/4 of the way in. I changed the setting higher, and wow. That impact action kicks in, and it just magically sends the screws home.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Best impact driver out there!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier I love dewalts impact driver this little guy gets the job done and I love the speed limiter (3 speed) it's has. ALSO mine came with the newer updates batteries with gauges on the back to show how much life the battery has left so that was a huge win!!! I trust dewalts tools all the time and so far after dozens of tools I have yet to run into a defect or dead tool. Each and every tool I own are still going stong even after abuse This driver is no exception this is my second one I only got another to have at home and one at work I love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Dukes Brew

customer_reviews.title: If you are building something with a lot of screws....
customer_reviews.text: If you need to screw down more than 20 screws and do not know what an impact driver is do your research. I hated normal drivers and assumed all of them skipped and rounded out at least 1/4 of the screw heads. A impact driver is amazing to prevent rounding, skipping, general frustration. I went through over 1,200 screws, rounded 1 off and that was totally my fault. And since it's a dewalt you know it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Snowden

customer_reviews.title: Ode to a tool
customer_reviews.text: Oh green goblin out you go Out to pasture afar Hello yellow fellow and welcome home Such a shining star. Light as a feather and sure as a stone Driven to drive with ease Stone, granite, drywall or wood You'll drive whatever I please. Subfloors, rafters, studs and shelves The biggest big to small I never knew there was a tool that actually had it all. So if you need a new one, a first one, or a last, just buy this tool and I will tell you You'll wish you'd done so in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to remove 80 ft lb lug nuts.

I saw some comments/reviews claiming they are able to remove their lug nuts and that why I bought it. Might be good for contractors but not for automotive. Going for the DCF889 or 899.

product_meta.title: DEWALT 20V MAX XR Impact Driver Kit, Brushless, 3-Speed, 1/4-Inch, 2.0-Ah (DCF887D2)
product_meta.description: Style:Impact Driver KitThe DEWALT DCF887D2 20V MAX XR Li-ion Brushless 1/4" 3-Speed Impact Driver Kit (2.0 Ah) features a DEWALT built brushless motor and XR Lithium-Ion batteries which deliver more run time and capacity over standard units. This impact driver has 3-speed settings for optimized application versatility, along with Precision Drive in speed 1 for precision applications and added control. It offers three (3) LED lights with 20 second delay after trigger release to provide visibility without shadows. It also allows for one-handed loading 1/4" hex chuck with easy grip sleeve, and accepts 1" bit tips. This unit has a compact and lightweight design to fit into tight areas (2 mm shorter than the previous DCF886). Kit includes: (1) DCF887 - Brushless 1/4" 3-speed Impact driver, (2) DCB203 - 2.0 Ah 20V MAX XR Batteries, (1) Fast charger, Belt Clip, Kit Box.
